mapper.select: select name, email, kidClass, kidName, tel, photo from parent
mapper.insert: insert into parent(member_uid,name,kidClass,kidName,tel,photo) values((select m_uid from member where email=#{email}),#{name},#{kidClass},#{kidName},#{tel},#{photo})
mapper.update: update parent set name=#{name}, kidClass=#{kidClass}, kidName=#{kidName}, tel=#{tel}, photo=#{photo} where email=#{email} and pwd=sha1(#{pwd})
mapper.select: select name, kidClass, kidName, tel, photo from parent where member_uid=#{member_uid}
